text: Hamono şumorai mohho az rūi hukm va taqdiri Alloh, dar kitoʙi Alloh, - az on rūz, ki osmonhovu zaminro ʙijofarida, - duvozdah ast. Cahor moh mohhoi haromand. In ast dini haq. Dar on mohho ʙa saʙaʙi çanghoi nohaq ʙar xeştan sitam makuned. Va hamcunon, ki muşrikon hamagī ʙa çangi şumo ʙarxostand, hamagī ʙa çangi onho ʙarxezed. Va ʙidoned, ki hamono Alloh ʙo parhezgoron ast, ononro nusrat medihad va pojdoraşon megardonad
